cause.description:
Raise money to pay Jay's lawyer and help keep him out of Jail!!
(NOTE - PLEASE DO NOT DONATE MONEY, IT WILL BE FORWARDED TO ANOTHER CAUSE.... THIS WAS CREATED AS A JOKE)
1. Jason must remain out of jail!
cause.mission: Raise money to pay Jay's lawyer and help keep him out of Jail!!
cause.name: Keep Jason FREE
